verses.roman:
gosāñi kahe,--'eka-kṣaṇa ihā nā rahiba
gaṅgā pāra kari' deha' e-kṣaṇe caliba"

synonyms: gosāñi kahe—Sanātana Gosvāmī said; eka-kṣaṇa—even for one moment; ihā—here; nā rahiba—I shall not stay; gaṅgā pāra kari' deha'-help me cross the River Ganges; e-kṣaṇe—immediately; caliba—I shall go.
translation: Sanātana Gosvāmī replied, "I shall not stay here even for a moment. Please help me cross the Ganges. I shall leave immediately."
